title: NEW PATCH DOWNLOAD GOING PAST THE REQUIRED AMOUNT??  (Pictures to explain further)
body:
There's a new patch out and It's only supposed to download only 4.3 mb but it's going past that and the ETA time is at : -1 

Here's a photo to explain easier.

http://imgur.com/a/skLWG

It then showed bug splat ??? 

then carried on 

Lmao i have no idea whats going on 

It's going up in download contentiously rn at 130mb  

help me :(

replies.body: Holy caps!  Loading bars give good estimates, but isn't always 100% accurate.  You could be having an unstable connection that's causing your network to backtrack and grab missed files while updating.  Wait this out and let it finish patching, and go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network for future patches.  Let me know if that clears things up.
It did a bug splat then just closed. I'm using wired and gone through the KB article, still experiencing issues.

Thanks for the update!  Bugsplats can happen from a failure to load or render something properly.  It can be caused by bad drivers, game files, or even hardware.  Instead, I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your settings and PC are in good health.
Gone through the Game crash guide, the problem still lies within the update going on forever. I started it again it's at 250mb right now. Got any other Ideas?

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help and take a closer look.  Grab some logs from the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get more context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
hey, im having the same problem.. any updates?
